body_html: Unfortunately the mul fix proposed by @cancan101 makes constant_value linear time in the size of the whole graph in the worse case. Therefore, I don't think we can support it in that form. I'll close this issue as now as out of reach of simple contributions (and for lack of activity).
body_text: Unfortunately the mul fix proposed by @cancan101 makes constant_value linear time in the size of the whole graph in the worse case.  Therefore, I don't think we can support it in that form.  I'll close this issue as now as out of reach of simple contributions (and for lack of activity).
body: Unfortunately the `mul` fix proposed by @cancan101 makes `constant_value` linear time in the size of the whole graph in the worse case.  Therefore, I don't think we can support it in that form.  I'll close this issue as now as out of reach of simple contributions (and for lack of activity).
